A controversial essay is one which the author takes a particular stand on a highly-charged issue. It is often argumentative in that it is seeking to argue for or against one side of a controversial issue. However not all argumentative essays are controversial as some argue for or against issues that are not highly charged. Controversial essays are often arguing for or against a political stance, ideology or issue. Below are some controversial essay topics from the net.
